name: WaterMelon Mosikkaeng
description:
Combine watermelon with your friends to make a bigger fruit.

Drop the fruit in the bottle. When two of the same fruits meet, the next size of fruit is produced.
Get more points by making bigger and bigger fruits and even making the biggest fruit, watermelon!
If the fruit overflows out of the bottle, the game ends.

모시깽[mosikkaeng]

A word used instead when a person or an object's name cannot come to mind quickly or is difficult to say directly.
